name: Princess Nail House - Girl's Manicure & Makeover
name_original: Princess Nail House - Girl's Manicure & Makeover
description:
Now you can create the most fashionable manicure for yourself and your friends. Choose from a variety of fab nail polishes, patterns, glitter, stickers, and gems. You can design any kids of nails as you wishes!

Features:
• Easy to play, suitable for all players
• Create super stylish nail designs
• Select your favorite nail polish from a variety of colors
• Dissolve polish with the cotton ball if you make a mistake
• Add trendy patterns and use the slider to change color and size
• Glam up your designs with glitter, stickers, and gems
• Have a photo shoot and share your creations with friends
